p.d:
The GDChart extension provides an interface to the bundled gdchart library. This library uses GD (bundled) library to generate 20 different types of graphs based on supplied parameters.
The extension provides an OO interface to gdchart exposing majority of options via properties and complex (array) options via a series of methods.
To use the current version of the extension PHP 5.0.0 is required, and older PHP 4 only version can be downloaded from CVS, by checking out the extension with PECL_4_3 tag.
